meanings.sent1: She visits her grandmother oftener now.
meanings.sent3: The cat meows oftener when it wants attention.
meanings.sent4: The flowers bloom oftener in the spring.
meanings.sent5: The clock ticks oftener as the deadline approaches.

meanings.sent1: They clean their house oftener to keep it tidy.
meanings.sent2: The students raise their hands oftener in class.
meanings.sent3: The birds chirp oftener when the sun shines.
meanings.sent4: The river flows oftener after heavy rain.
meanings.sent5: The wind blows oftener during stormy weather.
